name: kelnmaar-multiplayer-stats
title: KelnMaar's Multiplayer Statistics
author: KelnMaar
description: Comprehensive multiplayer statistics with 22-tier ranking system and 36 challenging achievements! Features visual planet icons (🪐🌋🌩️❄️🌿), player comparisons, crafting history, real-time leaderboards, and complete Space Age integration. Perfect for competitive multiplayer servers with extreme survival challenges up to 1000 hours.
